title: Mathematics Education Optimization Plan Through Digital-Based Learning (DBL) Preference Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematics concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Comparative study on preferences between digital device-based and paper-based learning for pre-professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can comparatively analyze the strengths and weaknesses of DBL (Digital-Based Learning) and paper-based learning (PBL)
Learners can explain the correlation between their learning preferences and digital usage time
Learners can design hybrid learning strategies optimized for mathematics instruction
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
